questions.question: He asked me what …………………..
questions.description: In reported questions, the auxiliary verb goes after the subject.

questions.question: The stranger enquired where ………………
questions.description: In reported questions we do not use do, does or did.

questions.question: He asked them ………………… they would listen to such a man.
questions.description: We can use if or whether to report Yes/No questions.

questions.question: The policeman ordered us ……………..
questions.description: We use infinitives to report imperative sentences.

questions.question: She said that she ..................... me.
questions.description: Past tenses are used after a past reporting verb.

questions.question: The king asked the philosopher whom he ………………….. the happiest man living.
questions.description: Past tenses are used after a past reporting verb.

questions.question: Alladin asked the magician what ………………….. to deserve such a severe punishment.
They asked who ..................... and what ……………….
questions.description: In reported questions, the subject goes before the auxiliary verb.

questions.question: He told me to wait until he ……………….
questions.description: We use past tenses after past reporting verbs.

questions.question: The king was deeply grieved and asked his wife what ………………….. do for her.
questions.description: A past reporting verb is followed by verbs in the past tense.

questions.question: He proposed that …………….. wait for the news.
